# add(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a given object to the set.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ object: Any)
```

## Parameters

- **object**: The object to add to the set.

## Discussion

If `object` is already a member, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCountedSet/add(_:)] increments the count associated with the object. If `object` is not already a member, it is sent a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-c.protocol/retain] message.

## Adding and Removing Entries

- **remove(_:)**: Removes a given object from the set.
